CustomHelpMenuItem.name: CustomHelpMenuItem
CustomHelpMenuItem.description: Represents the items within a section of the Lightning Experience help menu that the admin added to display custom, org-specific help resources.

LinkUrl.description: Required. The URL for the resource. Specify up to 1,000 characters.

MasterLabel.description: Required. The name of the resource. Specify up to 100 characters.

ParentId.description: The ID of the custom help section the item belongs to.

SortOrder.description: Required. The order of the item within the custom section. Valid values are 1 through 15.
